communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

In a follow up to 
cia-rdp96-00792r000600340001-4
ASSESSMENT OF SOVIET ELECTRICAL BRAIN STIMULATION RESEARCH AND APPLICATIONS

Pleae provide records about Soviet or American long distance neuromodulation , neurostimulation ,and neuronal stimulation using electromagnetic waves . 

Records mentioning or describing:

Non-contact long-range magnetic stimulation (for neurostimulation)
Non-contact long-range electric stimulation  (for neurostimulation)
Non-contact Neurostimulation 
Non-contact electrical brain stimulation 
Non-contact interferential stimulation
Non-contact electronic brain stimulation for  locomotion 
Non-contact magnetic brain stimulation for locomotion 
Electromagnetic wave neurostimulation 
Non-contact Electromagnetic wave neurostimulation 


As my primary purpose is to inform about government activities and research by reporting on it and making the raw data available, I request that fees be waived.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Martin Seidel
